short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your own To-Do Manager developed by Shyam Sunder Kanth.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Task Hub" is a user-friendly Chrome extension, designed to streamline your task management experience. This extension is feature-rich and aims to make your daily to-do list management not just productive but enjoyable as well.

Feature's include:
1. Today's Date
2. Motivational quote
3. Task input and validation
4. Beautiful task list (Pending & Completed)
5. Update added task functionality
6. Sorting (Alphabetically & Reverse Alphabetically)
7. Real time task counter badge updation
8. Task reversal if mark as done by mistake
9. Done something extra? Add directly to the completed list
10. Developer's Note
